revisions.rev:
'''Security software''' is a generic term referring to any [[computer program]] or [[library (computing)|library]] whose purpose is to (help) secure a [[computer system]] or [[computer network]]. Types of security software include:
* [[Antivirus software]] * [[Anti keylogger]] * [[Cryptographic software]] * [[Firewall (computing)|Firewall]] * [[Intrusion detection system]] (IDS) * [[Spyware]] remover * [[Sandbox (computer security)]] * Any operating system security feature
[[Category:Computer security software| ]]
